channel.title: 2 simple questions if your a coder
channel.description: How do you make an npc change which direction there facing. And how do you make an npc drop 2 items ( What drop type? 1,2,3,4,or 5?)

item.title: 2 simple questions if your a coder
item.dc:creator: @teh_hacker teh_hacker
item.description:
@teh_hacker wrote:

first one i donâ€™t know, second one, where you see this in your npchandler.java

ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomINTNAME(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

just duplicate it, like say the name was KBD, and this is what 1 drop looks like

ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomKbd(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

to make 2 drops, make it like this

ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomKbd(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomKbd(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

and so on and so on

Read full topic
item.source: 2 simple questions if your a coder
